CM2.qu_est_ce_qu_un_polygone: C’est une figure fermée avec plusieurs côtés.
CM2.comment_calculer_la_moyenne: On additionne les valeurs et on divise par leur nombre.

6e.qu_est_ce_qu_une_fraction: C’est une manière de représenter une partie d’un tout.

5e.qu_est_ce_qu_un_nombre_premier: Un nombre divisible uniquement par 1 et par lui-même.

4e.comment_resoudre_une_equation: On cherche la valeur qui rend l’égalité vraie.

3e.qu_est_ce_qu_une_fonction: C’est une relation entre deux ensembles.

5e.qu_est_ce_qu_un_mammifere: Un animal qui allaite ses petits.

4e.qu_est_ce_que_l_evaporation: Passage de l’état liquide à gazeux.

5e.qu_est_ce_que_la_colonisation: Contrôle d’un territoire par un autre pays.

CM2.what_is_a_polygon: A closed figure with multiple sides.

6e.what_is_a_fraction: A way to represent part of a whole.

5e.what_is_a_prime_number: A number divisible only by 1 and itself.

4e.how_to_solve_an_equation: Find the value that makes the equality true.

CM2.what_is_photosynthesis: The process by which plants make energy from sunlight.

6e.what_is_a_planet: A celestial body orbiting the sun.

5e.what_is_a_mammal: An animal that nurses its young.

4e.what_is_evaporation: The change from liquid to gas.

3e.what_is_the_water_cycle: The continuous movement of water on Earth.

CM2.what_was_the_french_revolution: An event in 1789 that ended the monarchy.

6e.who_was_napoleon: A general who became French emperor.

5e.what_is_colonization: Control of a territory by another country.

4e.what_is_slavery: Depriving people of freedom and treating them as property.

3e.what_is_decolonization: The process of colonies gaining independence.

CM2.nini_ni_poligoni: Ni umbo lililofungwa lenye pande nyingi.

6e.nini_ni_fraction: Njia ya kuwakilisha sehemu ya kitu kizima.

CM2.menene_polygon: Wani siffar da take da bangarori masu yawa kuma a rufe.

CM2.menene_photosynthesis: Hanyar shuka ke amfani da hasken rana don yin abinci.

CM2.menene_juyin_juya_hali_na_faransa: Abin da ya faru a 1789 da ya kawo karshen sarauta.

CM2.kini_polygon: Ona to ni eti pupo to si wa ni pipade.

CM2.kini_photosynthesis: Ilana ti eweko nlo lati da ounje nipa imole oorun.

CM2.kini_iyipada_faranse: Iselẹ to waye ni 1789 to pari ijọba.
